front.reference: Journal of Fluorescence, Vol. 14, No. 4, July 2004

docTitle.titlePart: Label Free Colorimetric Biosensing Using Nanoparticles

front.note: Received December 15, 2003; revised February 3, 2004; accepted February 3, 2004
front.div:
In this review article, we discuss a class of biosensors that exploit the change in the colorimetric
properties of noble metal nanoparticles in response to biomolecular binding at their surface. Several
sensor fabrication techniques as well as sensor configurations are discussed with an emphasis on
their strengths and limitations. We conclude by presenting the future prospects and challenges for the
successful transition of this technology from the laboratory to a commercial product.
